manpage.title: getenv, _wgetenv

description.para: Gets the value of environment variable from current environment.

return.para: The function returns a pointer to environment table entry containing the environment variable name. It is not safe to modify the value of the environment variable using the returned pointer. Use the _putenv function to modify the value of an environment variable. if the environment variable name is not found in the environment table, the return value is NULL.

remarks.para: The getenv function searches the list of the environment varaible for varname. The function is not case sensitive.
_wgetenv is a wide-character version of getenv, the argument and return value are wide-character strings.
